mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_client c JOIN t_client_info ci ON ci.company_number = c.company_number
AND ( c.company_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR c.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR c.owner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY c.company_number LIMIT #{pageDTO.size} OFFSET #{pageDTO.offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_client c JOIN t_client_info ci ON ci.company_number = c.company_number
AND ( c.company_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR c.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR c.owner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
mapper.sql: p.idx -- 인덱스 , p.type -- 타입 , p.name -- 이름 , p.unit -- 단위 , p.quantity -- 개수 , p.price -- 가격 , DATE(p.reg_date) AS reg_date -- 등록일

FROM t_product p

p.is_deleted = 'N'

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_recipe_master rm
-- 상품 idx JOIN t_product p ON p.idx = rm.product_idx
rm.is_deleted = 'N' AND rm.approval_status = '0'
AND ( rm.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY rm.reg_date desc -- 최근 등록 순 LIMIT #{pageDTO.size} OFFSET #{pageDTO.offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_recipe_master rm
-- 상품 idx JOIN t_product p ON p.idx = rm.product_idx
rm.is_deleted = 'N' AND rm.approval_status = '0' -- 작성완료(RECIPE_MASTER_APPROVAL)
AND ( rm.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY rm.reg_date desc -- 최근 등록 순 LIMIT #{pageDTO.size} OFFSET #{pageDTO.offset}
